name: 2023 Int'l Conference on Medicinal Chemistry and Drug Discovery
content: 2023 Int'l Conference on Medicinal Chemistry and Drug Discovery (MCDD 2023) will be held during July 14-16, 2023 in Guilin, China. The conference will cover issues on Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discovery, etc. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
